snippet: The share of births that occur outside of marriage has risen for all women since 1990, but white women with less than a four-year college degree have seen the greatest percentage increases.
lead_paragraph: The share of births that occur outside of marriage has risen for all women since 1990, but white women with less than a four-year college degree have seen the greatest percentage increases.

headline.seo: Unmarried Households Are Increasingly the Norm...
headline.main: Unmarried Households Are Increasingly the Norm...
